reviewText: Ben Johnson rides like the wind.  Back in the days when Hollywood actors had skill and dignity.  Great movie, especially for horse lovers.
IF YOU DON,T HAVE THIS MOVIE YOU SHOULD GET IT GREAT MOVIE
This needs to be a movie

Another classic western Ben Johnson act's a good part in this movie his dedication to
rescuing this wild stallion a childhood pet who escapes but is eventually reunited
Lot's of action great scenery shots great colour it is a short movie it only runs for 70mins but well worth watching
a real classic western.
